name: Entwined (itch)
description:
The game is about twins who cannot touch, they set out on a quest to lift their curse. They have to navigate mazes, requiring them to reach their respective exits.

Controls: Arrow keys.

The red twin merely needs to solve the maze, however the blue twin needs to solve the maze while avoiding his red twin (who is stuck in a time loop from the first pass)

Team:

David Weatherhead, Retief Fourie.

Special thanks to Tim Harbour for music and sound effects.
